name: Cosmic Balls
description:
You're a ghost thingy. Your goal is to survive as long as you can while destroying nuts but be careful because the more you break the more balls will spawn. You can collect various power-ups that can help you avoid the balls and maybe even destroy them.

Controls:

wasd to move

mouse to attack/use power

A game for Insane Game Jam: Future. Also the first game I ever 'finished' (there's a few weird bugs but I'm not exactly sure why they're there or how to fix them). I made it in Scratch because I got drunk and felt nostalgic at the time. All the soundtrack, sound effects and graphics were made by me.
